thread.title: Brazil's Odebrecht, Queiroz Galvao say quitting Angra 3 project
thread.title_full: Brazil's Odebrecht, Queiroz Galvao say quitting Angra 3 project | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Brazil's Odebrecht, Queiroz Galvao say quitting Angra 3 project
text: SAO PAULO Aug 12 Engineering groups Odebrecht and Queiroz Galvao said on Wednesday they are exiting the consortium building the Angra 3 nuclear reactor in Brazil due to payment delays from Eletrobras unit Eletronuclear. (Reporting by Luciano Costa; Editing by Chris Reese )
